ygData.subject: Re: RE: Creating Magical Armor and Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Str, for a warrior raises both your ATK and your maxium damage.  Of course you do not see these bonuses until after about 20-25th lvl.  At 36th lvl, with a
ygData.messageBody:
Str, for a warrior raises both your ATK and your maxium damage. Of course you do not see these bonuses until after about 20-25th lvl. At 36th lvl, with a good str buff I get about an extra 5 points max damage, and my atk goes up in the area of ï¿½ of the str buff, ie a 30 point buff gives me 15 extra atk.

>>> "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> 7.13.99 9:52:20 AM >>>
From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>

<SNIP>should hope so, its what our class does! what next? Take away damage
bonuses for str to fighters cause it might make them the best melee
class in the game? <END SNIP>

What damage bonuses to Warriors from strength... Warriors have nothing
special from stength... Only thing strength affects is the ability to hit
maximum damage with your weapon (at above 20th level I hear). 150 str and 75
str still do the same raneg of damage.... HAd to throw that in the bucket of
complaints...

-Zantaer, 19th Circle Warrior, Fennin Ro, Sterling Order or Knights
